Gigs.MoreInfo:
ADDICTIVE PHILOSOPHY http://www.addictivephilosophy.biz/

Fantastic Ska/Punk band from Derby on Tour. We play a range of original music from mellow rocksteady to full throttle thrash, but mainly levelling out in the Ska/Punk area - think Rancid, Specials, Inner Terrestrials and Crass, but as far and wide as The Paragons to Discharge. Check our lyrics page out for what we're about - we say what we think and we're not shy about it!!

**************************************************

DYSPHONIA http://www.facebook.com/pages/Dysphonia/172102612817880?sk=info

Local Post-punk heroes. Influenced by The Cramps, The Dead Kennedys, Bowie, Joy Division, Magazine, Siouxsie and the Banshees.

**************************************************

SENTON BOMBS http://www.myspace.com/thesentonbombs

Punk infected Rock 'n' Roll from Galleon Favourites Senton Bombs. Influences: Aerosmith, AC/DC, Bad Religion, Clash, Dead Kennedys, Megadeth, Misfits, New Bomb Turks, Operation Ivy, NOFX, Ramones, Rancid, Sonics, Springsteen, Supersuckers, Zeke
